text: Potterchitto Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Potterchitto is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean either (sources vary) "broad" or "big furrow/big valley". Variant names are "Poto Chitto Creek", "Pottok Chetto Creek", and "Pottoxchitto Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Newton County, Mississippi
title: Potterchitto Creek
